outputs.name: hoys
outputs.description: List of dates in this analysis period.

outputs.name: dates
outputs.description: List of hours of the year in this analysis period.

inputs.name: _timestep_
inputs.description:
An integer number for the number of time steps per hours.
Acceptable inputs include: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 10, 12, 15, 20, 30, 60

name: LB Analysis Period
description:
Create an Analysis Period to describe a slice of time during the year.
